Title: scheb/two-factor-bundle bypass two-factor authentication with unverified JWT trusted device token
Description: Before version 3.7 the bundle is vulnerable to a [security issue in JWT](https://auth0.com/blog/critical-vulnerabilities-in-json-web-token-libraries/), which can be exploited by an attacker to generate trusted device cookies on their own, effectively by-passing two-factor authentication.
NotImpacted: All versions before 3.0.0, all versions starting from 3.7.0
